name: GDO-TWO
description:
When the sun goes away ... When the ship gets dark ... We must run! And don't forget to watch your breath! Because you have to run far!

This game is about the lonely captain of his ship, who faced the darkness.
Don't let darkness and loneliness take over the main character. Get away from it!

How to play

W - Jump

A/D - Turn

S - Roll forward

ESC - Menu

P.S

The project is under development and will be updated with new mechanics. Current version: 1.0
